game.name: Blade of Vengeance: Night Raid at Swift Peak Pass
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A 29th Army soldier in the 1933 night raid. Master shadows, avoid lights, and use your dadao in this UE5 stealth game. Execute enemies or deflect bullets. Chinese opera music and masks create a unique "war drama" across 4 missions of courage.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A 29th Army soldier in the 1933 night raid. Master shadows, avoid lights, and use your dadao in this UE5 stealth game. Execute enemies or deflect bullets. Chinese opera music and masks create a unique "war drama" across 4 missions of courage.
